ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can French cut green beans, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup
1/4 (16 ounce) package buttery round crackers, crushed
des: "A co-worker brought this casserole to one of our potlucks.  After I got the recipe, I made it for one of my family's Thanksgiving dinners and it has been requested so often that it has become a staple at family gatherings."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, combine onion, celery, green pepper, cheese, corn, green beans, soup and sour cream.  Spoon into a 2-quart casserole dish.
Combine crushed crackers with melted butter and sprinkle on top of vegetables.
Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes.
